Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: changing a set of 64 pubkeys of notary nodes is a subject to network ugprade, or in other words needing hardfork of chains who are notarising using dPoW tech.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: single pubkey change because a node wants to sell, that means if needing to replace it with the one new pubkey from the candidate who didn't make it, and adding that candidate

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: candidate's key to the set of notarising keys, means hardfork.
